title: Peach Bowl 2026: How to Watch the Oregon Ducks vs Indiana Hoosiers Game Online forยFree
summary: The Peach Bowl kicks off Jan. 9 at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta at 7:30 p.m. ET.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. The 2026 Peach Bowl is headed to Atlanta. The college football playoffs continues with a showdown between the No. 5 Oregon Ducks and the No. 1 Indiana Hoosiers on Jan. 9 at 7:30 p.m. ET. Oregon has been on an impressive redemption run after being demolished as the top seed last season. But, so far this season, the team has been dominating on both sides of the ball, including allowing just 16.3 points per game on defense while the offense scored a whopping 39.2 points per game. On the flip side, Indiana has had a perfect run this year with being the only undefeated record remaining in the FBS. The 2026 Peach Bowl, at a Glance: Where: Mercedes-Benz Stadium, Atlanta, GA Time: 7:30 p.m. ET Broadcast: ESPN Stream: DirecTV , Fubo , ESPN Unlimited , Sling TV , Hulu + Live TV Who will come out victorious during the 2026 Peach Bowl?
